ComicInfo.Series: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong
ComicInfo.Summary: Justice League vs. Godzilla vs. Kong [Part 1]: As Clark Kent prepares to propose to Lois Lane, Supergirl and the Justice League respond when the Legion of Doom invades the Fortress of Solitude. During the ensuing battle, a portal is inadvertently opened to another Earth where monsters run rampant, resulting in the arrival of monsters on Earth.
